name: Crimson Protocol
description:
Crimson Protocol is a 2D Puzzle-Platform video game. Set in the futuristic world, you'll play as an AI and your job is to solve the puzzle in the room. You were equipped with a teleporter device to help you solve the puzzle. 

Features

  • Unique Puzzle Mechanic
  • Multiple Levels
  • Great Aesthetic

Credits

  1. Hosea Aldri - Game Producer
  2. William Andrew - Game Designer
  3. Eros Jagat Pulagana - Game Programmer
  4. Linggaprastha Ammar Ghazy Indyasena - 2D Artist
  5. Dimas Widia Bakti - 2D Artist
  6. Elgratio F.C.L - 2D Artist & Sound Engineer

How to Play 

  1. Use the arrow key to move
  2. Press space to jump
  3. Interact with an object by pressing z
  4. Interact with the blue panel to open gates
  5. Interact with a pink teleporter to activate the teleporter
  6. Teleport to teleporter by pressing X
  7. Solve the puzzle to get to the next stage

Bugs you should know 

1. At level 2 the locked gates were invincible, you need to interact with the blue panel to proceed to the next section
